main event: On 6 May 1949, multiple witnesses in Sidney, Ohio reported observing a bright unidentified flying object, with some describing it as cylindrical or disk-shaped.
interesting points: The object was observed by several witnesses over multiple days, including on 3, 4, and 6 May 1949., The object emitted a very bright light but made no sound or left any visible trail., Witnesses described the object as traveling at a high rate of speed in a straight flight path., One witness reported that the object appeared to be cylindrical and approximately five inches in diameter., All witnesses did not take any photographs of the object.
